Articles.Content:
I made another replica! and this time... of my FAVORITE plane!!! (the SU-47)

Halco Industries presents: The latest in replica technology, the SU-47 replica!!!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download: http://www./download/yqcsz1bbt83sh5t/Halco+Industries+SU-47.craft

The only mods I used are UniverseReplacer for the EVA/IVA suits (credit to Zekes for making those) and KerbPaint for painting the craft, so no modded parts are in this, thus it is usable with nothing but stock KSP (0.25 and higher)

Have fun!
Nice job But I think the wing could use a little more work:)
